mapper.select: /* 포인트 적립 코드 자동생성 */ SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN CONCAT('refund', '-001') ELSE CONCAT('refund-', LPAD(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(refund_code, 'refund-', -1)AS UNSIGNED))+1, 3, 0)) END AS newCode FROM refund_info;
/* 환불 내역 조회*/ SELECT refund_code, pay_complete_code, pay_id, refund_reason, final_pay_price, refund_price, refund_point, refund_datetime, refund_state FROM refund_info;
